SELECT timediff(submit_time,begin_time) as spend_time,(SELECT username FROM sys_user WHERE id=c.user_id) as username ,c.user_id,c.name,c.lesson_id,c.problem_id,c.problem_name,c.problem_type,c.begin_time,c.type,d.id as record_id,d.submit_status,d.submit_time FROM (SELECT a.user_id,a.name,a.lesson_id,b.problem_id,b.problem_name,b.problem_type,b.begin_time,b.type FROM (select lesson_id,stu_id as user_id,(SELECT real_name FROM sys_user WHERE id=stu_id) as name from lesson_attend_log WHERE lesson_id=#{lessonId})a left join lesson_problem b on b.lesson_id =a.lesson_id and b.used=1 ORDER BY user_id,b.begin_time) c left join (select id,submit_status,submit_time,problem_id,problem_type,source_id,user_id,source from judge_record jr1 where source_id=#{lessonId} and not exists (select 1 from judge_record jr2 where source_id=#{lessonId} and jr1.problem_id = jr2.problem_id and jr1.problem_type=jr2.problem_type and jr1.source_id=jr2.source_id and jr1.user_id=jr2.user_id and jr1.source=jr2.source and jr1.id < jr2.id ) ) d on c.problem_id=d.problem_id and c.problem_type=d.problem_type and d.source_id=c.lesson_id and c.user_id=d.user_id and c.type=d.source
where type=#{type}
